actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that certain prisoners in Cuba be granted asylum.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) certain named, released Cuban political prisoners be granted asylum in the United States; (2) political prisoners not be used to effect policy changes by the Cuban Government; and (3) the Department of State seek other means to accomplish reinstatement of the December 14, 1985, Immigration Accord.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that certain prisoners in Cuba be granted asylum.
